name: Hide Slack sidebar w/ narrow window [alternative]
description: Based on this other userstyle. This hides the Slack sidebar when your window is less than 750px wide. It also ensures that the text correctly wraps when at small widths.
additional_info:
2017-01-12: Known issue – misbehaves when the Search Results, Starred Item, or other right-sidebar is open.

2016-12-23: Created style, fixing issue with the original style where at low window widths the sidebar was hidden but the messages were still padded on their left by the sidebar width amount.
